segments.text: I notice the boy stretching toward the cookie jar, balancing precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t realize how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting, and the floor is wet—this is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is just waiting, completely trusting him not to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this; someone needs to step in before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is useless right now, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll even notice if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is frustrating because it’s so preventable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just reach out and steady that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly if no one does anything soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
